spells.name: Tar Pit
spells.description: Place a marker on the game board. All Characters within 3” of it have their Move reduced to 1. This effect lasts until the Bog Magus is Prone or Knocked Out.

spells.name: Spirit Glaive
spells.description: Can be cast upon themselves or a friendly Character within 3” and lasts until the end of the Round. Instead of losing HP a target loses 1AP from their next Activation for each 3 Damage it takes from Melee Attacks from those wielding the Spirit Glaive.

spells.name: Forgotten Ritual
spells.description: All friendly Characters with the Bones Trait within 3” regain D3 AP.

spells.name: Justice of the Dead
spells.description: Any enemy Character that has Knocked Out a friendly Character suffers D6 Hits that ignore Armour and Shields.

armoury.name: Ancient Dead Ranged Weapon
armoury.description: The Ancient Dead use all manner of ranged weapons, from bows of wood to slings and javelins.

armoury.name: Sacred Blade
armoury.description: A weapon blessed by the priests of their time and interred to arm a warrior against the perils of the afterlife.

armoury.name: Familiar Jar
armoury.description:
One use only. Place a Barrow Hound in base contact with the user that can be Activated immediately

.

armoury.name: Circlet of Bronze
armoury.description:
+1 Armour that cannot be ignored or removed by any Attack

.

armoury.name: Barrow Marker
armoury.description: This Item is not equipped to a Character. Instead, during deployment place a token on any Open Terrain on the game board. At the start of each Round roll a D6. If a Success, replace a Knocked Out Skelt in base contact with the marker.

armoury.name: Skeleton Trumpet
armoury.description: A Character equipped with the Skeleton Trumpet may toot upon it for an Easy Feat. If successful, all friendly Characters with the Bones Trait within 6” get +1 Move for this Round.

armoury.name: Vengeance Coin
armoury.description: Choose one enemy Character at the start of the game. The Character with this Item has +2 Power on all Attacks against them.
